### JSON EXTRACT
Extracts a value from a JSON string using a subset of
[JSONPath](https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/rfc9535) syntax.

```esql
ROW log = """{"severity":"ERROR","body":"Payment processing failed"}"""
| EVAL severity = JSON_EXTRACT(log, "severity")
```
